title: BEST SPECIAL in San Leandro - CALL NOW AND TOUR TODAY! Only 1 left!
posting_body: Welcome to Hesperian Townhomes!
Accepting applications NOW!
Call now and Schedule a tour today
show contact info
Come home to Hesperian Duplexes in San Leandro and discover better living at your fingertips.
Our two-bedroom townhomes come with various features.
Completely renovated townhome to offer all of the modern conveniences you deserve!
Our spacious townhomes have been 100% freshly painted, and the entire first floor is wood laminate floors throughout!
The living room has large windows that welcome in the natural sunlight.
Step into the kitchen that offers stainless steel appliances with a refrigerator, gas stove, built-in microwave, and dishwasher with a separate dining area.
Every home is equipped with a washer and dryer.
A carpeted stairway leads to mosey upstairs to find large bedrooms that offer ample closet space and a hall bathroom with vanity and shower/tub.
With a spacious enclosed backyard and covered parking garage.
Coming home has never been more rewarding.
Perfect location for your on-the-go lifestyle with convenient access to major freeways, shopping, entertainment, dining, and Bayfair BART Station.
At the end of each day, you will love coming home to Hesperian.
To Qualify:
-$20 Application fee per adult
- $500.00 Deposit OAC
- Credit Score of at least 660
- Total monthly income MUST be 3x rent (no bank statement accepted)
- Must have solid Rental History (2years) / NO eviction or rental collections
